dct_title_s: Typus totius orbis terraquei geographice delineatus, et ad usum globo materiali supeirnducendus
dct_alternative_sm: Critica quadripartia, in qva pluva recens inventa, et emendate circa geographiae artificium, historiam, technicam, et astrologiam scitu dignissma explicantur
dct_description_sm: California as an island with rounded northern end.
"Fol. III." (upper left). Text inside circle on left of map: "Globvs geographi cvs novvs anno 1700 constrvct 9 monachii".
Issued in his Critica quadripartia, in qva pluva recens inventa, et emendate circa geographiae artificium, historiam, technicam, et astrologiam scitu dignissma explicantur. Pavs VII.
